name: space4environment
goal:
Making use of space observations for the environment.
Support the implementation of the Biodiversity Strategy for 2020, especially MAES and Green Infrastructure.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Biodiversity Strategy for 2020
MAES - Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services
Green Infrastructure
Copernicus
